fields.description:

Thanks [~ajisakaa].

Patch looks fine to me. I found few other package.info has same content too.Â 

org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.impl.pb.package-info

As Sunil said, {{org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.impl.pb}} package-info.java has the same content, however, it is not a problem. The problem is that a package is annotated more than once in package-info.java. There are two package-info.java for {{org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.impl}} package in hadoop-yarn-common module and hadoop-yarn-api module and the both has {{@Private}} annotation. The patch is to remove {{@Private}} from hadoop-yarn-api package.
Thanks [~ajisakaa] for working on this, patch looks good to me, will commit tomorrow if no objections.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #13643 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/13643/])
YARN-7906. Fix mvn site fails with error: Multiple sources of package (wangda: rev e795833d8c1981cab85a10b4e516cd0c5423c792)
* (edit) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-api/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/api/resource/package-info.java
Committed to trunk/branch-3.1, thanks [~ajisakaa] and thanks review from [~sunilg]
